display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 160px; max-width: 280px; width: 280px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

div.p: An exploit is used to push a payload, gupje in this case, to the target device. Gupje responds to the host with b'GiAs', indicating that it is ready to receive commands. A patched bootloader is then send from the host and booted
